package.name: Sttl_Prolog_18
package.summary: Synchronize your inventory and order data with Prolog logistic software
package.description:
1. This extension facilitates Store Admin to synchronize Inventory from Prolog to Magento 2. Orders placed through Magento are transferred automatically to Prolog for processing. 3. Once orders have been processed in Prolog, the status will also automatically be synchronized with Magento. 4. Customers get the latest status for their orders from Magento Store front. 5. Cron jobs are required to be created so inventory and orders status can be updated automatically from Prolog to Magento. 6. Extension works with multi line orders. 7. Extension works with Configurable products. 8. This Extension work ONLY for shipping method- UPS Ground, UPS Next Day Air, UPS 2nd Day Air, USPS Priority Mail & USPS Priority Mail International 9. The extension does not generate Packing slip
IMPORTANT: Inventory cannot be Synchronized from Magento to Prolog.
package.notes: Synchronize your inventory and order data with Prolog logistic software
